desc: Uniting Cronos one step at a time.

layout.text: At ScareCRO, we know community is key. Organic word of mouth growth is the key to long term success. Our team are working hard night and day, and with the support of our amazing community we will take ScareCRO all the way up. Earn rewards and shill as a community. We will be the catalyst for the Cronos blockchain.
